title: Murali Meets Meera
plot: The whole story of the film happens in one night. It starts with the film's hero Murali accidentally meeting a young girl Meera on the day he wants to end his life.
synopsis: the story begins with Murali who is on his way to commit suicide as he is dumped by Shwetha. While Murali is riding a bike, he comes across Meera at a traffic signal. A small argument happens and a twist of situations happens leading both of them to stay together. Murali gets close to Meera and in no time, he proposes to her. That's when Meera reveals about her past, that she is a prostitute. What happens from there forms the rest of the story.
